players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night"
Charlie: "we need to discuss who was the mafioso that killed Alice last night"
Diana: "Alice was the villager killed last night, Bob is the mafioso who did it. Charlie and I are the remaining villagers."
